title: CARRIER 0.8 Ton 3 Star Split Inverter Cold Catalyst Filter with Auto cleanser(2023 Model) AC  - White  (CAI09ER3R33F0, Copper Condenser)
description: The Carrier 0.8-Ton AC provides you with a pleasant breeze on a hot day and has a multitude of additional functions to keep you comfortable and fresh all summer. The innovative external components of this air conditioner are designed to create a comfortable cooling atmosphere even when the outside temperature hits 52° C. Also, you can quickly cool off and get comfortable during the intense heat with the aid of Turbo Cool Mode. By eliminating airborne microparticle pollutants, the Cold Catalyst Filter also maintains the cleanliness and wellness of the air in your home. Also, the superior-quality copper tubes utilised by this Carrier AC allow for quick heat transmission, provide long-term endurance, and can thus withstand big loads.
reviews: I initially thought it might not be the right one because my room is larger than what's recommended, and I bought it in a hurry because it was on sale, but I think I made the right decision to choose this. It provides excellent cooling, though not as well as my LG. Still, in terms of cooling capacity, this AC is superior to others. It cools down my room in 15 to 20 minutes, and I feel like it's the right time to work. Waiting for electricity bills... I'll post an update here on bill.READ MORE

Also, you can quickly cool off and get comfortable during the intense heat with the aid of Turbo Cool Mode. By eliminating airborne microparticle pollutants, the Cold Catalyst Filter also maintains the cleanliness and wellness of the air in your home. Also, the superior-quality copper tubes utilised by this Carrier AC allow for quick heat transmission, provide long-term endurance, and can thus withstand big loads.

It features the user-friendly MirAie App, which is driven by AI. Also, you can adjust temperature settings for the night with this AC's customised sleep mode, offering enhanced versatility. The app further enables the creation of unique temperature profiles for weekdays and weekends. Moreover, this AC has an auto-diagnosis feature that warns users when problems are anticipated and identifies them beforehand, and the app supports one-touch service requests.
reviews: This is my second AC fr Panasonic, and i m happy that i took right decision.Cooling is decent.After cooling the room, Ampere it takes is in between 1.2 - 1.5, which is quite effecient in terms of electricity.My room size is 10ft x 10ft and its on first floor where direct sunlight comes on roof.Google Assistant integration works perfect. Just say...Turn on/off my Bedroom AC from anywhere in your home in same network, command works everytime!READ MORE

description: You can maintain a pleasant and comfortable temperature in your home with the Panasonic CS/CU-KZ18ZKYF 1.5-ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner.
